docs.snippet: Malika Yousufi lined her bike up alongside her teammates on a lonely road outside the Afghan capital, getting ready for her weekly training ride away from the disapproving stares of Kabul....

docs.snippet: Bismark Lithgow, 26, faces a maximum of 25 years to life in prison for stabbing his girlfriend 38 times and hiding her body in a plastic barrel in his bedroom in Harlem....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bismark Lithgow, 26, faces a maximum of 25 years to life in prison for stabbing his girlfriend 38 times and hiding her body in a plastic barrel in his bedroom in Harlem.
docs.abstract: Harlem man Bismark Lithgow is convicted of second-degree murder in 2013 fatal stabbing of his girlfriend Francis Alfonso Pellerano.

headline.main: Harlem Man Is Convicted of Murdering His Girlfriend
headline.print_headline: Man Convicted of Murdering His Girlfriend

docs.snippet: Dominique Hawkins, a sophomore guard, was a high school star in Kentucky and dreamed of being a Wildcat, but he doesn’t get to play much on an undefeated team....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dominique Hawkins, a sophomore guard, was a high school star in Kentucky and dreamed of being a Wildcat, but he doesn’t get to play much on an undefeated team.
docs.abstract: Profile of University of Kentucky guard Dominique Hawkins, former high school basketball star who, as a reserve on an undefeated team, gets little playing time.

headline.main: Beloved in Kentucky, but Benched for the Wildcats
